name: Catch'em All
description:
You are a new animal sitter and you get a lot of customers. The people want their pets back and get goin, while others drop their animals off. So you catch them with your trusty lead when you get an order and bring them back to their family. But dont be late!

## Authors

- Florian Zimmer

- Tobias Redlich

- Leon Zimmer

- Alwin Berger

- Jannis Jordan

- Luisa Kurz
